    • 方法详细资料

      • normalizeByMinMax

        public static Matrix[] normalizeByMinMax(Matrix[] src,
                         boolean reserve)
        Normalize the matrices by minimum element and maximum element of the matrix on the matrices.

        Given matrices A=Ai, i=0,1,2,...,N, the step of the method is:

      • step 1. Find the minimum and maximum element of A, we get two new matrix so-called min and max. min(i,j)=minimum[A1(i,j),A2(i,j),...,AN(i,j)], max(i,j)=maximum[A1(i,j),A2(i,j),...,AN(i,j)], i means the row index of A, and j means the column index of A.
      • step 2. Normalize A. Ai(j,k)=2*[(Ai(j,k)-min(j,k))/(max(j,k)-min(j,k))]-1.

参数:
src - A set of matrix want to be normalized.
reserve - Indicate replace the original matrix whether or not, if parameter reserve is false, the program will replace the original matrix with the new matrix after normalized.
返回:
Matrices after normalized.

  • computeCovarianceByRow

    public static Matrix computeCovarianceByRow(Matrix[] vectors,
                            Matrix mean,
                            int start,
                            int length,
                            double scale)

    Compute the covariance of the vectors consist of a set of row vector by row, this is an economical way to save storage space while the dimension of the vectors is very large because the method will not open up new storage space any more.

    Assume V=[v1,v2,...,vn], the covariance will calculate as:
    Cov=(V-M)*transpose(V-M), that M is the mean vector of V, and transpose means transpose of vector, Cov is the covariance matrix.

    参数:
    vectors - A set of vectors to compute the covariance.
    mean - Mean matrix.
    start - Start index of vectors to compute.
    length - Length to compute.
    scale - Scale, the covariance after computed will multiply the scale.
    返回:
    - Covariance matrix of the matrices

  • computeCovarianceByRow

    public static Matrix computeCovarianceByRow(Matrix[] vectors,
                            Matrix mean,
                            double scale)

    Compute the covariance of the vectors consist of a set of row vector by row, this is an economical way to save storage space while the dimension of the vectors is very large because the method will not open up new storage space any more.

    Assume V=transpose[v1,v2,...,vn], the covariance will calculate as:
    Cov=(V-M)*transpose(V-M), that M is the mean vector of V, and transpose means transpose of vector, Cov is the covariance matrix.

    参数:
    vectors - A set of vectors.
    mean - Mean matrix.
    scale - The covariance matrix after computed will multiply the scale.
    返回:
    Covariance matrix of the matrices

  • computeCovarianceByCol

    public static Matrix computeCovarianceByCol(Matrix[] vectors,
                            Matrix mean,
                            double scale)
    compute the covariance of the vectors consist of a set of row vectors by column, this is an economical way to save storage space while the dimension of the vectors is very large because the method will not open up new storage space any more.

    Assume V=[v1,v2,...,vn], the covariance matrix will calculate as:
    Cov=transpose(V-M)*(V-M), that M is the mean vector of V, and transpose means transpose of vector, Cov is the covariance matrix.

    参数:
    vectors - Row vectors.
    mean - Mean vector.
    scale - The covariance matrix after computed will multiply the scale.
    返回:
    Covariance matrix.

  • compute2DCovariance

    public static Matrix compute2DCovariance(Matrix[] matrices,
                         Matrix mean,
                         double scale)
    Calculate the 2-dimensional covariance of the matrices.

    Assume A=Ai, Ai is 2-dimensional matrix. The covariance will compute as:
    Cov=sum(transpose(Ai-mean)*(Ai-mean)).

    参数:
    matrices - A set of matrix.
    mean - Mean matrix
    scale - The covariance after computed will multiply the scale.
    返回:
    Covariance matrix

  • compute2DCovariance

    calculate the 2-dimensional covariance of the matrices

    返回:
